data.name: Ravager Bruiser
data.description: A boarding expert who uses an energy shield to deflect attacks.

starItems.name: Ravager Bruiser
starItems.description: A boarding expert who uses an energy shield to deflect attacks.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from the target + gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from the target + gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage. If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from the target + gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage. If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from the target + gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>
5.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> if primary target has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> instead

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage. If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from the target + gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> instead.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target
If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage. If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> + <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from the target + gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> instead.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

1.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Heal for <color=#86e619>700</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health

2.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Heal self for <color=#86e619>700</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade: Copy <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, from the primary target

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Heal self for <color=#86e619>700</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Copy <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, from the primary target.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on the primary target

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Heal self for <color=#86e619>700</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Copy <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, from the primary target.

Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on the primary target.

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Heal self for <color=#86e619>2,000</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Copy <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, from the primary target.

Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on the primary target.
5.nextUpgrade:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effects
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, copy all positive effects

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Heal self for <color=#86e619>2,000</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Copy <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, from the primary target. On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, copy all positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, instead.

Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on the primary target.
6.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Healing

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Heal self for <color=#86e619>2,000</color> Health + <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Copy <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, from the primary target. On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, copy all positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, instead.

Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on the primary target.

1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Block Chance
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block Chance.

On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.

3.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Block Chance.

On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies

4.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Block Chance.

On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
4.nextUpgrade:
<color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Block Chance.

On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

<color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, <color=#fff568>RAVAGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
